entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 40%
